data.eml:eml: Additions to knowledge of the paper wasp Polistes delhiensis Das and Gupta, 1989 (Hymenoptera: Vespidae: Polistinae) from Vietnam with description of the male and nest

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nguyen, Lien Thi Phuong, Nguyen, Cuong Quang, Bozdoğan, Hakan (2018): Additions to knowledge of the paper wasp Polistes delhiensis Das and Gupta, 1989 (Hymenoptera: Vespidae: Polistinae) from Vietnam with description of the male and nest. Zootaxa 4462 (1): 145-150, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4462.1.11
